summary: A utility script that transforms Animatediff motion LoRA checkpoint files from safetensors format into the structure required by the Diffusers library, optionally creating a repository and uploading the converted model to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to repurpose existing Animatediff motion LoRA models for integration with Diffusers pipelines and to share them easily on the Hugging Face platform.
